definitions: If you refer to the whereabouts of a particular person or thing, you mean the place where that person or thing may be found.
You use whereabouts, usually in questions, when you are asking or talking about where something or someone is exactly.
at what approximate location or place; where
the place, esp the approximate place, where a person or thing is
near or at what place? where?
at, in, or near what place
the place where a person or thing is
